com.quinsoft.zeidon.utils

Class PortableFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.utils.PortableFileReader

  • public class PortableFileReader
extends Object
    Generic logic to read Zeidon Object Instances from a file or stream. The OI is expected to be in "portable file" format.
    Author:
    DG

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Field Detail

      • STRING_STORED_AS_BLOB

        public static final char STRING_STORED_AS_BLOB
        Long strings or strings with control chars (like '\n') are stored as blobs. This char indicates that a string is stored as a blob.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STRING_STORED_AS_BLOB_REGEX

        public static final String STRING_STORED_AS_BLOB_REGEX
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PortableFileReader

        public PortableFileReader(ObjectEngine objectEngine,
                          ZeidonLogger logger,
                          InputStream inputStream,
                          PortableFileReader.PortableFileEntityHandler entityHandler)
        Instantiate a reader to parse an OI from a stream. Note that the inputStream is *NOT* closed.
        Parameters:
        logger -
        inputStream -
        entityHandler -

    • Method Detail

      • getStreamReader

        public BufferedBinaryStreamReader getStreamReader()

      • setStreamReader

        public void setStreamReader(BufferedBinaryStreamReader reader)
        Set the buffered stream reader. This allows a caller to read multiple OIs from a single stream. Explicitly setting the stream will prevent this logic from closing the stream.
        Parameters:
        reader -
